nodes.text: The wolgiyn tree was a species of tree that grew on the Mid Rim planet Ansion. When the Jedi Anakin Skywalker and Barriss Offee and their companion Bulgan were threatened by a flock of dangerous kyren birds, Skywalker noted that the only nearby shelter was a grove of three wolgiyn trees.
The wolgiyn tree appeared in the 2002 novel The Approaching Storm, written by Alan Dean Foster.
